skills.name: Fusillade
skills.description: Fires 5 arrows in a selected area to deal 80% of ATK as damage

skills.name: Fatal Attack
skills.description: Own CRIT increases by 100

skills.name: Poison Arrow
skills.description: Fusillade has 15% chance to poison the enemy. DEF of poisoned enemies will reduce by 15% for 4 secs.

skills.name: Enfeeble
skills.description: DEF of Enemy poisoned by Fusillade will decrease by an additional 15%.

skills.name: Enhance Poison
skills.description: Poison duration from the Fusillade will increase by 2 secs.

skills.name: Command Battle
skills.description: All Support Heroe's ATK increases by 40% for 6 secs.

skills.name: Eagle's Eye
skills.description: Own ACCURACY increases by 100.

skills.name: Enrage
skills.description: During the duration of Command Battle, all Support Heroes' CRIT increases by 20%.

skills.name: Steady Shot
skills.description: Own CRIT increases by 100.

skills.name: Leadership Qualities
skills.description: Duration of Command Battle increases by 1 sec.

skills.name: Summon Swordmans
skills.description: Summon 4 Swordmans. Swordmans inherit the hero's own abilities and fights for up to 16 secs. Hero doesn't 'Normal Attack'.

skills.name: Amplify Weapon Effect
skills.description: Swordmans' Stats will increase by an additional 20% of the Weapon's Stats

skills.name: Amplify Helmet Effect
skills.description: Swordmans' Stats will increase by an additional 20% of the Helmet's Stats

skills.name: Amplify Armor Effect
skills.description: Swordmans' Stats will increase by an additional 20% of the Armor's Stats

skills.name: Amplify Shoes Effect
skills.description: Swordmans' Stats will increase by an additional 20% of the Shoes' Stats

skills.name: Thunderbolt
skills.description: Rain down bolts of lightning in a selected area to deal damage of 150% of ATK.

skills.name: Amplify Magic
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG increases by 100.

skills.name: Petrify
skills.description: 50% chance to paralyze ennemy with Thunderbolt for 3 secs.

skills.name: Power of Lightning
skills.description: Own CRIT increases by 100.

skills.name: Enhance Petrify
skills.description: Paralysis duration from the Thunderbolt will increase by 1 sec.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Swing the Axe in an area to deal damage of 150% of ATK.

skills.name: Enhance Body
skills.description: Own CRIT Resist increases by 100.

skills.name: Push
skills.description: Shockwave has 20% to Stun the Ennemy for 3 secs.

skills.name: Ancestral Power
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG increases by 100.

skills.name: Enhance Shock
skills.description: Stun duration of Shockwave increases by 1 sec

skills.name: Warrior's Will
skills.description: All Warrior Heroes' DEF increases by 60% for 6 secs .

skills.name: Fortitude
skills.description: Own CRIT increases by 100.

skills.name: Encourage
skills.description: During the duration of Warrior's Will, All Warrior Heroes' Attack Speed increases by 20%.

skills.name: Grace
skills.description: Own CRIT Resist increases by 100.

skills.name: Credo
skills.description: Duration of Warrior's Will increases by 2 secs.

skills.name: Whisper of Wind
skills.description: All Support Heroes' Attack Speed increases by 40% for 6 secs.

skills.name: Suppressive Fire
skills.description: Own DEF Penetration increases by 150.

skills.name: Power of Storm
skills.description: During the duration of Whisper of Wind, all Support Heroes' CRIT increases by 20%.

skills.name: Enhance Ballista
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG increases by 150.

skills.name: Fair Winds
skills.description: Duration of Whisper of Wind increases by 1 sec.

skills.name: Summon Barbarians
skills.description: Summon 6 Barbarians. Barbarians inherit the hero's own abilities and fights for up to 16 secs. Hero doesn't 'Normal Attack'.

skills.name: Amplify Weapon Effect
skills.description: Barbarians' Stats will increase by an additional 40% of the Weapon's Stats.

skills.name: Amplify Helmet Effect
skills.description: Barbarians' Stats will increase by an additional 40% of the Helmet's Stats.

skills.name: Amplify Armor Effect
skills.description: Barbarians' Stats will increase by an additional 40% of the Armor's Stats.

skills.name: Amplify Shoes Effect
skills.description: Barbarians' Stats will increase by an additional 40% of the Shoes's Stats.

skills.name: Throw Boulder
skills.description: Thows a boulder in a selected area to deal damage of 150% of ATK.

skills.name: Enhance Strength
skills.description: Own ACCURACY increases by 150. Basic Attacks deal Area of effect damage.

skills.name: Big Impact
skills.description: Throw Boulder has 30% chance to stun enemies for 3 secs

skills.name: Sunder Armor
skills.description: Own DEF Penetration increases by 150.

skills.name: Concussion
skills.description: Stun duration from Throw Boulder will increase by 1 sec.

skills.name: Earth Shatter
skills.description: Strike Hammer down in a area to deal damage of 200% of ATK.

skills.name: Enhance Accuracy
skills.description: Own ACCURACY increases by 150

skills.name: Reaction
skills.description: Earth Shatter has 60% chance to knock the Ennemy into the air for 1 sec.

skills.name: Patience
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG Reduce increases by 150.

skills.name: Incredible Power
skills.description: Airborne duration of Earth Shatter increases by 0.6 secs.

skills.name: Javelin
skills.description: Throw the spear in a area to deal damage of 200% of ATK.

skills.name: Ancient Martial Arts
skills.description: Own DODGE increases by 150.

skills.name: Lightning Spear
skills.description: 30% chance to paralyze ennemy with Javelin for 3 secs.

skills.name: Fusillade
skills.description: Own Attack Speed increases by 15%

skills.name: Enhance Lightning
skills.description: Paralysis duration from the Javelin will increase by 1 sec.

skills.name: Pulse of Purification
skills.description: Swing the axe in a selected area to deal damage of 200% of ATK

skills.name: Super Strength
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG increases by 150.

skills.name: Soul Purification
skills.description: Pulse of Purification has a 30% chance to Stun the Enemy for 3 secs

skills.name: Way of Atonement
skills.description: Own CRIT Resist increases by 150.

skills.name: Enhance Pulse
skills.description: Stun Duration of Pulse of Purification increases by 1 sec

skills.name: Penitential Blow
skills.description: Strike Scimitar down in a selected area to deal damage of 200% of ATK.

skills.name: Ascetic
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG Reduce increases by 150.

skills.name: Huge Shock
skills.description: Penitential Blow has 60% chance to knock the Enemy into the air for 1 sec.

skills.name: Punishment
skills.description: Own ACCURACY increases by 150.

skills.name: Enhance Scimitar
skills.description: Airborne duration of Penitential Blow increases by 0.6 sec.

skills.name: Frost Arrow
skills.description: Fires an arrow to a selected area to deal damage of 250% of ATK.

skills.name: Enhance Bowstring
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG increases by 200

skills.name: Frost
skills.description: Frost Arrow has 50% chance to freeze the enemy. Speed of Frozen Enemy will decrease by 25% for 4 secs.

skills.name: Extreme Cold
skills.description: Speed of enemy frozen by the Frost Arrow will decrease by an additional 15%

skills.name: Enhance Frost
skills.description: Freeze duration of Frost Arrow will increase by 2 secs

skills.name: Restorative Pulse
skills.description: All Warrior Heroes' HP will recover equal to 50% of own ATK every second for 6 secs.

skills.name: Sacred Power
skills.description: Own Attack Speed increases by 20%

skills.name: God's Protection
skills.description: During the duration of Restorative Pulse, increases DEF of Warrior Heroes by 40%.

skills.name: Insight
skills.description: Own ACCURACY increases by 150

skills.name: Enhance Pulse
skills.description: Duration of Restorative Pulse increases by 2 secs

skills.name: Summon Cavalries
skills.description: Summon 8 Cavalries. Cavalries inherit the hero's own abilities and fights for up to 16 secs. Hero doesn't 'Normal Attack' .

skills.name: Amplify Weapon Effect
skills.description: Cavalries' Stats will increase by an additional 60% of the Weapon's Stats

skills.name: Amplify Helmet Effect
skills.description: Cavalries' Stats will increase by an additional 60% of the Helmet's Stats

skills.name: Amplify Armor Effect
skills.description: Cavalries' Stats will increase by an additional 60% of the Armor's Stats.

skills.name: Amplify Shoes Effect
skills.description: Cavalries' Stats will increase by an additional 60% of the Shoes' Stats

skills.name: Sacred Spear
skills.description: Slam the sacred spear vertically in a area to deal damage of 250% of ATK.

skills.name: Choosen One
skills.description: Own CRIT DMG increases by 200

skills.name: Divine Shock
skills.description: Sacred Spear has 60% chance to knock the Enemy into the air for 1 sec

skills.name: Blessing
skills.description: Own ACCURACY increases by 200.

skills.name: Blow Boost
skills.description: Airbone duration of Sacred Spear increases by 0.5 sec

skills.name: Frost Pulse
skills.description: Fire a Pulse in a area to deal damage of 250% of ATK

skills.name: Deception
skills.description: Own DODGE increases by 200

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: Frost Pulse has a 60% chance to freeze the enemy. Speed of Frozen Enemy will decrease by 25% for 3 secs.

skills.name: Extreme Cold
skills.description: Speed of enemies frozen by Frost Pulse will decrease by an additional 12%

skills.name: Enhance Pulse
skills.description: Freeze duration from Frost Pulse will increase by 1 sec.

skills.name: Knight's Coercion
skills.description: Strike down in a area to deal damage of 250% of ATK.

skills.name: Forbidden Magic
skills.description: Own CRIT increases by 200

skills.name: Abyssal Pulse
skills.description: Knight's Coercion has 60% chance to knock the Enemy into the air for 1 sec.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Own Attack Speed increases by 20%

skills.name: Enhance Pulse
skills.description: Airborne duration of Knight's Coercion increases by 0.5 sec

skills.name: Mana Explosion
skills.description: Explodes mana to deal damage of 250% of ATK in a area.

skills.name: Magic Shield
skills.description: Own DODGE increases by 200

skills.name: Corrosion
skills.description: Mana Explosion has a 40% chance to poison the enemy. DEF of poisoned enemies will reduce by 15% for 2 secs

skills.name: Violet Wand
skills.description: DEF of Enemy poisoned by Mana Explosion will decrease by an additional 15%

skills.name: Nightmare
skills.description: Poison duration from the Mana Explosion will increase by 1 sec

skills.name: Phoenix's Protection
skills.description: Archer's ATK increases by 80% for 6 secs

skills.name: Focus Mind
skills.description: Own ACCURACY increases by 250

skills.name: Light Energy
skills.description: During the duration of Phoenix's Protection, Archer's CRIT increases by 100%.

skills.name: Desire
skills.description: Own CRIT increases by 250

skills.name: Devotion
skills.description: Duration of Phoenix's Protection increases by 2 secs

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description: Fires 5 bombs in a selected area to deal 80% of ATK as damage.

skills.name: Enhance Bullet
skills.description: Own CRIT increases by 250. Basic Attacks deals Area of effect damage

skills.name: Incendiary Round
skills.description: Barrage has a 10% chance to Burn the enemies. ATK of Burned Enemies will decrease by 15% for 8 secs

skills.name: Black Gunpowder
skills.description: ATK of enemies burned by Barrage will decrease by 15%

skills.name: No Mercy
skills.description: Burn duration from Barrage will increase by 2 secs

skills.name: Summon Golemns
skills.description: Summon 10 Golems. Golemns inherit the hero's own abilities and fights for up to 16 secs. Hero doesn't Normal Attack.
